简单编辑器
sextends
xworker.app.view.extjs.widgets.grid.EditorWithReqIdTpl
Sdescription
#$@text#$@

<p>见示例：<a href="http.//localhost.9001/do?sc=xworkerappxworker.examples.extjs.BookEditor/@bookEditor">do?sc=xworkerappxworker.examples.extjs.BookEditor/@bookEditor</a>。</p>

#$@text#$@
